posts.post_content:
Jace Beleren finds your community comments boring.  
  
Your fate was sealed the moment he brainstormed, decided to unummon your vaunted Bankslayers, and Sculpt your Mind into a shape he found more amusing. How many sides does a destroyed-agon have? because thats the shape of your mind now.  
  
Best Signature I've ever seen on a forum:  
  
Jace: Just summon the most powerful equipment you can think of.  
Stoneforge: \*summons BANHAMMER  
Jace: NOT THAT ONE! XO  
  
I beg anyone who already has a playset to do the best they can to ruin, destroy and terrorize Extended and Modern like you did Standard. Please just get him a couple more bannings, so I can afford him. I really, really, really freaking want this card. :P

posts.post_content:
He's not 100 dollars so people don't buy him. He's 100 dollars because people *do* buy him.  
He is commonly thrust into every standard deck you will see, ever, from people who want to win and have no budget. You will see him ALL THE TIME if you play in standard. It's not "oh hey there's the guy that splurged on jaces," its, "Oh, hey, that guy didn't buy jaces."   
In other words, until he rotates, standard is not worth the money if you play to win. If you think you can make a profit after you spend 400 dollars on a playset of one card, its probably because you expect to resale them later. Jace is, in all ways, the [Skullclamp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skullclamp) they didnt ban, with one exeption; Skullclamp was traded and sold for 50 cents. Its actually a huge difference to how it affects the metagame.   
The only reason he isn't banned right now is because they want to believe he is an icon. They want superheroes in Magic, and they want Jace to be one of them. But for many of us he will always be an a... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
This guy is rated lower than [Jace Beleren](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace Beleren), and yet somehow, he is raping standard right now. There was even an article in DailyMTG stating that they didn't mean for him to be this powerful. Why is this at such a low rating? Probably spite and anger, which is understandable, I'm not a fan, either, but that doesn't mean Imma rate it low, Imma rate it high because it is such a good card!  
But those with him, sell him now, he'll probs lose a lot of value once Zendikar rotates out of standard  
  
Edit: BANNED!!!!!! Forget selling him, take him to Extended!
